Fire Alarm Sensor Project

Fire alarm sensor projects using Arduino can help monitor and detect potential fires in certain areas. Fire alarm sensor projects using Arduino can help monitor and detect potential fires in certain areas. Required Components: 1. Arduino Board: For example Arduino Uno, Nano, or Mega. 2.Fire Sensor: For example temperature sensor (DS18B20 or LM35) for high temperature detection. 3.Buzzer or Alarm: To give an alarm signal. 4.LED: For status indicator. 5.Cables and Breadboard: To connect components.

Mikrotik Router Configuration

Mikrotik is a software-based operating system that is used to turn a computer into a network router. Mikrotik uses the Linux operating system as the basis for its network router. And I use an application called Winbox, Winbox is an application used to configure and manage MikroTik RouterOS network devices. Winbox can be used to remotely remote the router graphically. I use the RB-951 Ui-2HnD routerboard device.

Troubleshooting and Checking Networks at School

Konfigurasi Switch Cisco

Switch configuration is the process of setting up and adjusting switch devices in a computer network to meet certain needs. A switch is a network device that connects various devices in a local network (LAN) and manages data traffic between these devices. switch configuration includes: 1.Basic Setup: Set device name, IP address, and access credentials. 2.VLAN Setup: Divides the network into logical segments to improve security and efficiency. 3. Port Settings: Determines the function of the port, whether as an access port (for certain VLANs) or a trunk (for several VLANs). 4.Security: Set security features to prevent unauthorized access. 5.Network Management: Manage how data is transferred and prioritized within the network. I am using a Cisco switch sg200-08 device.

Installation Activities

Fiber Optic

Fiber optic learning refers to the process of learning and understanding fiber optic technology, which is a method of transmitting data using light sent through glass or plastic fibers. Fiber optics is known for its ability to transmit data at high speeds and over longer distances compared to traditional copper cables. in fiber optics I studied K3LH (safety, health at work), the basics of fiber optics, fiber optic components and tools, installation and testing (connecting fiber optics, stripping fiber optic cables, measurements), understanding potential problems that can occur in the system fiber optics, such as signal loss, distortion, and methods to overcome these problems.
